column1: Why choose iNeuron For Data Science Master Program?
column2: iNeuron is not only a training institute but also comprises of a team of senior data scientists who have multiple years of experience in data science; deep learning; and machine learning and iNeuron is also into product development. Thus we have the capabilities to provide hands-on training to our candidates via in-house project contribution.

column1: is this course fit for me?
column2: Yes the course is designed to suit the preferences of both freshers as well as working professionals.All the core concepts are taught from the basics to the advanced level.

column1: Do I have to be good in multiple programming languages?
column2: No we train our students in the programming language like Python and R. The class starts from the basics and goes on till the candidate has not mastered the programming language.

column1: After completing the course will I get job opportunities?
column2: Of course we at iNeuron train the candidates according to the industry needs and specification. We also provide minimum of 3 job referrals along with resume building support as well as training on in-house projects and mock interviews.

column1: What are the timings and duration for the course?
column2: We have both an online as well as an offline class; available in multiple slots; available for both weekend and weekdays.

column1: Do I have to bring my laptop to class?
column2: It is strongly advised that the candidate brings their laptop to class since it is a practical course and a laptop will be required to practice all the instructions provided in the class. Also for machine learning and deep learning model creation you will get GPU access from iNeuron.

column1: What are the eligibility criteria?
column2: We don稚 have any eligibility criteria for our programs as we teach from start to end. Thus anybody interested in the course can join

column1: After completing the course will I get the certificate of Completion?
column2: You will be receiving a certificate of completion from iNeuron stating the completion of the course. The certificate has an international validity.

column1: Where will the classes be conducted?
column2: As of now we have multiple locations in Bangalore. Thus training is possible in any center convenient to the candidate and online classes will be conducted on our live platform.

column1: Will I get the same facilities in Online Batches aswell?
column2: Both online as well as offline classes will be getting the same facilities in terms of resume building; mock interview preparations; job opportunities and much more.

column1: What's the refund policy?
column2: Refund will only be given within two weeks of joining the class.

column1: Will I be assisted for Interview Preparation?
column2: After successful completion of the course the candidate will be given multiple rounds of mock interview preparation as well as a minimum of 3 job referrals

column1: Will there be placement opportunities at the end of the course completion?
column2: There will be placement opportunities after completion of the course. We will also be providing a minimum of 3 job referrals.

column1: Will I be getting any Internship opportunities to enhance my skills?
column2: We are a product based company working on 50+ products for both domestic as well as international markets. Thus we provide our candidates the opportunity to work with us and contribute in our in-house projects which will enhance the candidate痴 skill sets and knowledge on the subject.

column1: Do I need to buy some other things rather than a laptop? Like online material; books; etc?
column2: NO.Everything will be provided by iNeuron such as Books; Study materials etc.

column1: What if I am having experience of 4+ in any other domain and I opt for the course then will that experience be counted to get the job as a Data Scientist?
column2: We are responsible for building your resume. So a well-structured plan will be drawn out for each candidate resume concerning years of experience; projects and technology.

column1: What is the admission process?
column2:
Step 1:- Discussion with the counselor
step 2:- Ask for the demo
step 3:- career goals and objectives
step 4:- enrolment process

column1: Is accommodation provided?
column2: No we don稚 provide any such facilities. Although we have contacts with certain vendors and could make arrangements if required by the candidate.

column1: If I am free on someday apart from a class session; can I visit for more support?
column2: Sure. You can visit iNeuron 24/7 and we will be more than happy to help.

column1: If I missed some classes; then can it be rescheduled for me?
column2: The recordings for all the classes will be available in the dashboard. The candidate is most welcome to join any of the batches. Also the candidate can reach out for help regarding any issues.

column1: Will recordings be available to revise some of the sessions?
column2: All sessions will be recorded and will be provided for revision as per the convenience of the candidate.

column1: What is the next batch schedule?
column2: An email with your details have already been sent to the support team. They are going to contact you soon.

column1: What is the course fees?
column2:
The course fees for varius courses are as follows:
Data Science Masters: INR 40000 +GST
Machine Learning Masters: INR 3000 +GST
Deep Learning Masters: INR 3000 +GST
NLP Masters: INR 3000 +GST

column1: What about job?
column2:
We'll provide referral to the candidates. We have our own custom portal where you can search for jobs.
The link is:  https://jobs.ineuron.ai

column1: What about placement assistance?
column2:
We'll provide referral to the candidates. We have our own custom portal where you can search for jobs.

column2:

column1: What is the course duration?
column2:
The course durations for various courses are:
Data Science Masters:  6 Months course+ 3 Months Projects
Machine Learning Masters: 4 Months course+ Project Discussions
Deep Learning Masters: 4 Months course+ Project Discussions
NLP Masters: 4 Months course+ Project Discussions

column1: What about after class support?
column2: Support after class shall be provided in terms of doubt clearing; different software installation or any other course-related issue that you might face during the course.

column1: What if I am not comfortable with the timings and I want to change the batch?
column2: You can contact the support team. They値l assist you in getting different batch.

column1: What are the EMI options available?
column2:
An EMI option is available only for the Data Science masters course. You can avail a Zero Cost EMI for 6 months if 
1)	You live in any of the 5 cities: New Delhi, Mumbai, Kolkata, Bangalore, Chennai.
2)	You have an HDFC or ICICI credit card.

column1: What is the cut-off to get a certificate?
column2: A certificate is issued to the candidates scoring at least an overall 60 %.

column1: Will you provide support for my own custom project?
column2: Yes. We値l be more than willing to help you with all the hurdles.

column1: Will you help with my resume preparation and discussion?
column2: Yes. We値l help you build your resume based on the domain you have already worked in.

column1: What are the internship opportunities?
column2: Both paid and unpaid internships are available with us. The selection for the internship will solely depend on your interview result.

column1: Do you provide internship opportunities?
column2: Both paid and unpaid internships are available with us. The selection for the internship will solely depend on your interview result.

column1: Can I get an internship after the course completion?
column2: Both paid and unpaid internships are available with us. The selection for the internship will solely depend on your interview result.

column1: What about interview preparation?
column2: We値l have at least 3 Mock interviews for each candidate to prepare them for a job interview.

column1: Do you help with interview preparations?
column2: We値l have at least 3 Mock interviews for each candidate to prepare them for a job interview.

column1: Are there any mock interview sessions?
column2: We値l have at least 3 Mock interviews for each candidate to prepare them for a job interview.

column1: Do you provide scholarship as well?
column2: No. Currently we are not offering any scholarships.

column1: Are there any scholarships available?
column2: No. Currently we are not offering any scholarships.

column1: What will be the level of the course?
column2: The course caters to the needs of both absolute beginners and the knowledged ones. We値l start from scratch and then take it to the level where the candidates are ready for job interviews.

column1: Is this course sufficient for getting a job?
column2: The syllabus of the course covers all the concepts which are required for cracking an interview and landing a job.

column1: What are the skills required for a data scientist?
column2:
The primary skills are:
1.	Basic analytical ability
2.	A mathematical approach to the problem at hand
3.	EDA to build intuition from data
4.	Concepts of deep learning 
5.	Concepts of NLP
6.	Model deployments

column1: How will I do a transition from my current field to data science?
column2: We値l help you to showcase relevant projects based on your previous experience and help you with resume and interview preparation. With all this you値l definitely be in a position to change jobs.

column1: How will you help with my career transition?
column2: We値l help you to showcase relevant projects based on your previous experience and help you with resume and interview preparation. With all this you値l definitely be in a position to change jobs.

column1: Is it possible to do a career transition if I have work experience in another domain?
column2: We値l help you to showcase relevant projects based on your previous experience and help you with resume and interview preparation. With all this you値l definitely be in a position to change jobs.

column1: What are the prerequisites for attending this course?
column2: There are no prerequisites as such. We値l start from scratch assuming that the candidates are entirely new to the filed and then we値l build the concepts from the beginning itself.

column1: Which programming language are you using for the course?
column2: This course is conducted in python 3.X version.

column1: In which language the course is taught?
column2: This course is conducted in python 3.X version.

column1: Are you going to use Python or R?
column2: This course is conducted in python 3.X version.

column1: Why are you using Python instead of R for this course?
column2: Python is used because it has a more extensive set of libraries for both Machine Learning and Deep Learning compared to R.

column1: Is a mathematical background required for taking the course?
column2: A mathematical background is not required. We値l explain all the mathematics involved thoroughly.

column1: What is the mathematical background needed for the course?
column2: A mathematical background is not required. We値l explain all the mathematics involved thoroughly.

column1: Do I need a degree in Statistics to become a data scientist?
column2: A degree in statistics is not mandatory to become a data scientist.

column1: Is previous programming experience required for attending the course?
column2: The assumption for the course is that the attendees do not know programming at all. We値l start right from the fundamental of programming.

column1: Do I need to be good at programming to attend the course?

column2:
We shall cover deployment to the following Cloud service providers:
1.	Google Cloud Platform
2.	Microsoft Azure

4.	Pivotal
5.	Heroku

column1: What algorithms are part of the course?
column2: The list of the algorithms is already mentioned in the syllabus already sent to you. We値l cover all the industry-leading algorithm s and libraries.

column1: Is a Masters or Doctorate required to become a data scientist?
column2: There are no such requirements. The selection shall depend on your performance in the interview.

column1: Is an M.Tech or PhD required to become a data scientist?
column2: There are no such requirements. The selection shall depend on your performance in the interview.

column1: How many hours do I need to study daily?
column2: The learning rate varies from person to person. But around 2 hours daily shall suffice.

column1: Which course should I take first? ML or DL?
column2: Our suggestion would be to cover ML first and then go for DL. But there is no such dependency. You can take the course in any order.
